verify.name: Check if fruit_basket.sh exists
verify.hint: Make sure you have created the file fruit_basket.sh in the ~/project directory.

verify.name: Check if variables are defined correctly
verify.hint: Make sure you've defined the COST_PINEAPPLE variable with the value 50 in the fruit_basket.sh file.

verify.name: Check if total cost calculation is present
verify.hint: Ensure that you've added the line to calculate the total cost in the fruit_basket.sh file. It should look like: TOTAL=$((COST_PINEAPPLE + (COST_BANANA * 2) + (COST_WATERMELON * 3) + COST_BASKET))

verify.name: Check if echo statement is present
verify.hint: Make sure you've added the line to display the total cost in the fruit_basket.sh file. It should look like: echo "Total Cost is $TOTAL cents"

steps.title: Make the script executable and run it

verify.name: Check if script output is correct
verify.hint: Ensure that your script is calculating and displaying the correct total cost. The expected output should include "Total Cost is 128 cents". Check that all your calculations are correct and that you're printing the result properly.
